Comments_List: Profound but intensive knowledge of ancient civilizations and their ritual experiences, methods for analyzing sensory experiences
I started to think about sensoriality in ancient societies, and acquired some insights into interdisciplinarity by listening to the comments of researchers and graduate students from other fields.
One week was just simply not enough for one civilization. If this very course were to be offered in the future, I think it would be better to focus on fewer cultures but in more depth.
Yes, it is a great course to learn about cultures that usually fall out of the standard class themes, from the Mayas to China.
